data.message: Facebook, when i click on the new featured albums feature under our friends list, it keeps "the content you requested cannot be displayed right now. it is temporarily unavailable, the link you clicked on may have expired, or you may not have permission to view this page." why am i seeing this?

replies.message: Hi Adria. We regret to hear this. If something's not working with your Facebook, you can report it to us here: http://bit.ly/2tWMC7r. -Stephanie

seems to be working now, but i don't get what the point of that feature is when people want to keep things between friends only. but one thing i am wondering, why doesn't my public page Adria Taylor receives pop-up notifications when someone likes or comments on a post or photo? but another page I was added to receives pop-up notifications. does it have to do with the number of likes you have on your page or how well, posts or photos are reached to your audience?
